text: Nannhausen Airfield (or Flugplatz Nannhausen in German) is a small airstrip in Nannhausen, Germany. It is located along the B50 between Simmern and Kirchberg and is close to the much larger Frankfurt Hahn Airport. It has a single grass runway in the direction 06 / 24 with a length of 560 meters (1,837 feet). ==See also== * Transport in Germany * List of airports in Germany ==External links== *Airliners.net - photos taken at Nannhausen Airfield Category:Airports in Rhineland-Palatinate Category:Rhein-Hunsrück-Kreis
title: Nannhausen Airfield
